title: Justin Purdie
text: Justin Evan Perelini Purdie (born 13 May 1980 in <a href="Wellington">Wellington</a>, New Zealand) is a New Zealand <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player of Samoan origin. He plays at <a href="Flanker%20%28rugby%20union%29">flanker</a> and won 8 caps for the <a href="Samoa%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Samoa national rugby union team</a> and represented them at the <a href="2007%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2007 Rugby World Cup</a>.
